sentences.en: " I never did , either,'said Carrie merrily, her face flushed with delight.
sentences.cn: “ 我也没想到, "嘉莉开心地说, 她的脸因为兴奋泛起了红晕.

sentences.en: Both NATO and the Community knew they could not go merrily on as before.
sentences.cn: 北约与欧共体都明白他们不可能再像以前那样高枕无忧了。

sentences.en: Chris threw back his head and laughed merrily.
sentences.cn: 克里斯回过头，开心地笑了。

sentences.en: One could hear them singing and dancing merrily out in the street.
sentences.cn: 人们在外面的街道上都能听到他们欢快的歌舞声.

sentences.en: She carried on merrily, not realizing the offence she was causing.
sentences.cn: 她毫无顾忌地胡闹，没意识到惹人生气了。

sentences.en: The birds chirp merrily at the top of tree.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿在枝头欢快地啾啾鸣唱.

sentences.en: The country is at peace and the people go merrily to their work.
The ferry cut merrily through the water.
The log fire was blazing merrily.
There they were, merrily describing their 16-hour working days while simultaneously claiming to be happily married.
sentences.cn: 他们一面高兴地描绘着每天16个小时的工作，一面又声称自己婚姻幸福。

sentences.en: Up to then, they'd merrily bashed out albums in between tours.
sentences.cn: 那时，他们已经利用巡演的间隙轻松炮制了多张专辑。

sentences.en: When she went out the sparrows were twittering merrily in joyous choruses.
sentences.cn: 她出门时,大群的麻雀在叽叽喳喳地欢唱.
